attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/StefanKarpinski|@StefanKarpinski>: Hey <https://twitter.com/github|@github>: I'm not sure when this happened, but it seems like all releases that you serve are now 403's when downloaded with curl or libcurl which is royally fucking things up in the #JuliaLang ecosystem and probably elsewhere. Works fine when downloading with wget, no idea why
attachments.text: Hey <https://twitter.com/github|@github>: I'm not sure when this happened, but it seems like all releases that you serve are now 403's when downloaded with curl or libcurl which is royally fucking things up in the #JuliaLang ecosystem and probably elsewhere. Works fine when downloading with wget, no idea why

text: try to ping also <https://twitter.com/GitHubHelp>, they reply from time to time, `@github` doesn't engage much

attachments.title: GitHub Support (@GitHubHelp) | Twitter
attachments.text: The latest Tweets from GitHub Support (@GitHubHelp). Official @github support is here to help! No DMs, please. Find even more answers at <https://t.co/ODayEnN06w> and <https://t.co/Uh6l3ITabd>

elements.text: , they reply from time to time,
